    • Field Detail

      • timer

        private long timer

        Timer current tick

      • active

        private boolean active

        If timer is active

        Timer is active if not deactivated by a signal in the input side While active the timer is counting down

      • delay

        private long delay

        Timer delay

        Delay, in ticks, the timer outputs power

      • switchMode

        private boolean switchMode

        Timer mode

        Delayed mode - sends a signal at specific intervals Switch mode - switches signal at specific intervals

      • output

        private boolean output

        Timer is outputting power

        Get timer output

        Returns:
        true if timer is outputting, false otherwise

      • setOutput

        public void setOutput​(boolean output)

        Sets timer output

        If timer is outputting power, then output is true Otherwise output is false
        Parameters:
        output - New timer output

      • getSwitchMode

        public boolean getSwitchMode()

        Gets the timer mode

        Returns:
        false if timer is in Delayed mode, true for Switch mode

      • setSwitchMode

        public void setSwitchMode​(boolean mode)

        Changes the timer mode

        For Delayed mode set mode to false For Switch mode set mode to true
        Parameters:
        mode - New timer mode

      • update

        public boolean update​(Circuit circuit,
                      int power,
                      Side side)

        Triggers a tile update

        Checks if timer needs to be updated, by comparing the previous state with the next state of the timer
        Overrides:
        update in class Tile
        Parameters:
        circuit - Circuit where updates are taking place
        power - Power received on the update
        side - Side from which timer received an update
        Returns:
        true if timer was updated, false otherwise

      • nextTick

        public boolean nextTick()

        Updates tile and calculates next tick

        Calculates next tick based on the timer status, the timer mode Sets output if necessary
        Overrides:
        nextTick in class Tile
        Returns:
        true if the tile output was updated, false otherwise
